channel.title: Connecting my server to the net(millenium edition)
channel.description:
Ok so I have millenium edition windows, cant use hamachi. Well at least that i know of. Is there anyway to have it online for others to use besides hamachi, also I was looking for a way to allow my other computer to play on the server as well. I have a linksys router/cable/2 computers.
I have my source compiled and i access it all the time through moparscape on my computer so i believe i have everything ineed with the exception of a way to get it publicly online.
If anyone knows away, or if i missed a guide somewhere please shoot me a link or respond if you can help.
Thanks Mul

item.title: Connecting my server to the net(millenium edition)
item.dc:creator: @liamsford liamsford
item.description:
@liamsford wrote:

Did you open a port or 2?

Read full topic
item.source: Connecting my server to the net(millenium edition)
